title: Remy International Launches Two New Websites
text:
Remy International, Inc. 
PENDLETON, Ind., Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Remy International, Inc. (NASDAQ: REMY), manufacturer of Remy速 light duty starters and alternators, and Delco Remy速 heavy duty starters and alternators, has launched two new mobile-friendly websites in support of their Delco Remy and Remy brands. Both sites offer new accessibility and productivity features to better serve customers. 
"Our analytics tell us that most of the visits to our site are to access the electronic catalog," said Global Marketing Manager Martha Avery, who was responsible for the project. "We responded to that need by designing the websites so part number and application data is available with just one click." 
The Delco Remy site (delcoremy.com) is dedicated to Remy's heavy duty business in both the aftermarket and original equipment segments. It features new product navigation, a distributor locator, and a fuel savings calculator that clearly illustrates their successes in achieving increased fuel economy. 
The Remy site (remyautoparts.com) is a new location developed for the light duty aftermarket, with the professional installer in mind. In addition to the new catalog, the site provides new product coverage information and technical support. 
"Frequent visitors to the Delco Remy site will still find Spec-it-Right, Delco Remy Connect, and all the technical support and information they are accustomed to seeing," continued Avery. "Light duty installers will find many useful support features on the new Remy site. We are excited to deliver these new tools to our customers." 
About Remy International, Inc. Founded by the Remy brothers in 1896, Remy International, Inc. (NASDAQ: REMY) is a leading global manufacturer, remanufacturer, and distributor of alternators, starter motors, and electric traction motors for the automotive and commercial vehicle industry, marketed under the Remy速 and Delco Remy速 brands. The company also provides multiline products through its subsidiaries. Headquartered in Pendleton, Indiana, with operations across five continents and ten countries, Remy is a trusted partner to original equipment manufacturers and aftermarket organizations worldwide, delivering creative solutions for today's vehicle challenges. For more information visit remyinc.com.
